item.title: MIUI OS3.0.6.0.WNXCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro 12.4 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro 12.4 China

Codename: sheng

Version: OS3.0.6.0.WNXCNXM | 16.0

Size: 9.5 GB

MD5: 7ffb405a60f6babbaa441c55e996a824

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to January 2026. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS3.0.5.0.WNXMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro 12.4 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro 12.4 Global

Codename: sheng

Version: OS3.0.5.0.WNXMIXM | 16.0

Size: 7.6 GB

MD5: a286502b3ce81b9bb0e196a87a9bbc89

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Camera stability
Fix: Volume couldn't be adjusted for multiple apps in some cases
Fix: Split screen wasn't displayed correctly with some third party apps
Updated the security patch to January 2026. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
Fix: Home screen flashed after unlocking in some cases
[Recents]
Fix: Cards occasionally disappeared from Recents in Split screen
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Status bar colors weren't displayed correctly in some cases

Download: Here
